str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Now, just now, at this moment. Adverb from a derivative of airo through the idea of suspension; just now.
Timothy, a Christian of Lystra, helper of Paul. From time and theos; dear to God; Timotheus, a Christian.

str2: To come, go.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.

Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
And, even, also, namely.
A primary word; 'good'.
Remembrance, recollection, mention; commemoration. From mnaomai or mimnesko; recollection; by implication, recital.

str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.

str2: From epi and potheo; to dote upon, i.e. Intensely crave possession.
Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
